1.text: Pour in a dash or so of cream for a classic thickener.

2.text: Spoon in yogurt for a creamy, tangy base.

3.text: Use coconut milk or cream for a vegan option.

4.text: Stir in whole, beaten eggs for a creamy, savory addition.

5.text: Put chunks of bread in your soup for an easy thickener.

6.text: Pour in instant or quick oats for a hearty soup.

7.text: Mix flour or cornstarch with water for hearty meat soups.

8.text: Add instant potato flakes to thicken chowders and potato soups.

9.text: Create a beurre manie for a simple, buttery solution.

11.text: Bring your soup to a gentle boil.

12.text: Remove the lid from your soup so the liquid can evaporate.

13.text: Separate the soup into smaller pots to speed up the process.

14.text: Stir the soup as it boils to keep it from burning.

15.text: Remove the soup from the heat when it reaches your desired thickness.

16.text: Puree nuts to add richness, flavor, and protein.

17.text: Scoop out and blend part of the soup for an easy, flavorful fix.

18.text: Use a stick blender to easily puree the soup in the pot.
